divs: Sighting DetailsI was on patrol on sr166 when I saw 3 objects about what seemed to be 75 to 100ft above the telephone wires, they were heading east on the south side of theroad. I follwed them, rolled my window down, but could not here any engines.they had flashing lights all the way around toward the top of the object. so Iturned my reds on to see If my doing that would show them, If they were of thisworld they would know I was a police officer, or if not they could see I had thesame lights as they did. When I turned the reds on they changed course andheaded south and I was unable to follow. I also have had 2 other strangehappenings in my life, I am now 53 yrs old.
trends: There have been no other sightings in thompson twp
This sighting has never been favorited.
